page.title: 15Verwood Supernatural.
page.content: Miss Gertie Sims now 91 years old lives in{Eastworth Farm}on the Road to Alderholt which is said to be haunted. It used to be the{Heathpoult Inn once used by{Smugglers.}Miss Sims has never seen the{Ghost,}but she hears it open the door and go up the stairs. She thinks that it is the Ghost of a man who was hung from a nearby tree. The Smugglers used to hide barrels under the floor. A Smuggler tried to give away the secret, so he was caught and hung. Legend has it that{Stephen's Stone,}a solitary block of stone in{Wild Church {Bottom}has a{golden casket}beneath it. It is said that it measures 6M X 3M X 3M approx. It could be a{boundary {stone.}In 1220 it was recorded as{"Le {Horestone"}and was a boundary point in this area.
